option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:shape="rectangle"> <gradient android:angle="135" android:startColor="#E8EAF6" android:centerColor="#F3E5F5" android:endColor="#FCE4EC" android:type="linear" /> </shape>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView android:id="@+id/nav_view" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="?android:attr/windowBackground" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent" app:menu="@menu/bottom_nav_menu" />
<fragment android:id="@+id/nav_host_fragment_activity_main" android:name="androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" app:defaultNavHost="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/nav_view" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:navGraph="@navigation/mobile_navigation" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_background_light">
<com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView android:id="@+id/nav_view" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/card_background" android:elevation="8dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent" app:menu="@menu/bottom_nav_menu" />
<fragment android:id="@+id/nav_host_fragment_activity_main" android:name="androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" app:defaultNavHost="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/nav_view" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:navGraph="@navigation/mobile_navigation" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_light" android:paddingBottom="50dp" android:clipToPadding="false" tools:context=".ui.dashboard.DashboardFragment">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp"> <!-- Header --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="0dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/purple_500" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="0dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Nuevo Cliente" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="Complete los datos del cliente" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" android:alpha="0.9" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Card principal del formulario --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<!-- Sección Datos Básicos --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Datos Básicos" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_home_black_24dp" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:drawableTint="@color/purple_700" />
<View android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@color/purple_500" />
<!-- Reparto --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilReparto" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:hint="@string/label_reparto" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700" app:startIconDrawable="@drawable/ic_dashboard_black_24dp" app:startIconTint="@color/purple_500"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputReparto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Nombre --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilNombre" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_nombre" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputNombre" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Dirección --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilDireccion" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_direccion" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700" app:endIconMode="custom" app:endIconDrawable="@android:drawable/ic_menu_search" app:endIconTint="@color/purple_500"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputDireccion" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:focusable="false" android:clickable="true" android:inputType="none" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Localidad --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" android:id="@+id/tilLocalidad" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_localidad" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700"> <AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/dropLocalidad" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="none" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Sección Contacto --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="Contacto" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_person" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:drawableTint="@color/purple_700" />
<View android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@color/purple_500" />
<!-- Teléfono --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilTelefono" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:hint="@string/label_telefono" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700" app:prefixText="+54 "> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputTelefono" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="phone" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Email --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilEmail" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_email" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputEmail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Día de visita --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" android:id="@+id/tilDiaVisita" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_dia_visita" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700"> <AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/dropDiaVisita" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="none" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Card de Promoción --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<!-- Sección Promoción --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/section_promo" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_sale" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:drawableTint="@color/purple_700" />
<View android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@color/purple_500" />
<!-- CheckBox mejorado --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/purple_50" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:strokeColor="@color/purple_200">
<CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkDispFC" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_disp_fc" android:padding="12dp" android:textSize="16sp" android:buttonTint="@color/purple_500" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Fecha de entrega --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilFechaEntrega" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:hint="@string/label_fecha_entrega" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700" app:endIconMode="custom" app:endIconDrawable="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:endIconTint="@color/purple_500"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputFechaEntrega" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:focusable="false" android:clickable="true" android:inputType="none" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Tipo de promoción --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" android:id="@+id/tilTipoPromo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_tipo_promo" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700"> <AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/dropTipoPromo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="none" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Observaciones --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilObservaciones" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_observaciones" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700" app:counterEnabled="true" app:counterMaxLength="200"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputObservaciones" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:minLines="3" android:maxLines="5" android:maxLength="200" android:gravity="top" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Botón Guardar --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnGuardar" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.UnelevatedButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="@string/action_guardar" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:icon="@drawable/ic_send" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:cornerRadius="28dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/purple_500" android:elevation="4dp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:paddingBottom="50dp" android:clipToPadding="false" tools:context=".ui.dashboard.DashboardFragment">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Header con gradiente --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="0dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@android:color/transparent" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:cardCornerRadius="0dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/top_wave_background" android:padding="24dp" android:paddingBottom="32dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Nuevo Cliente" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.02" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="Complete los datos del cliente" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="15sp" android:alpha="0.95" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Card principal del formulario con efecto glassmorphism --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp">
<!-- Sección Datos Básicos --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Datos Básicos" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_home_black_24dp" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:drawableTint="@color/purple_700" />
<View android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@color/purple_500" />
<!-- Reparto --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilReparto" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:hint="@string/label_reparto" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700" app:startIconDrawable="@drawable/ic_dashboard_black_24dp" app:startIconTint="@color/purple_500"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputReparto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Nombre --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilNombre" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_nombre" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputNombre" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Dirección --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilDireccion" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_direccion" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700" app:endIconMode="custom" app:endIconDrawable="@android:drawable/ic_menu_search" app:endIconTint="@color/purple_500"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputDireccion" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:focusable="false" android:clickable="true" android:inputType="none" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Localidad --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" android:id="@+id/tilLocalidad" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_localidad" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700"> <AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/dropLocalidad" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="none" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Sección Contacto --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="Contacto" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_person" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:drawableTint="@color/purple_700" />
<View android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@color/purple_500" />
<!-- Teléfono --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilTelefono" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:hint="@string/label_telefono" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700" app:prefixText="+54 "> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputTelefono" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="phone" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Email --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilEmail" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_email" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputEmail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Día de visita --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" android:id="@+id/tilDiaVisita" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_dia_visita" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700"> <AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/dropDiaVisita" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="none" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Card de Promoción --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<!-- Sección Promoción --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/section_promo" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_sale" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:drawableTint="@color/purple_700" />
<View android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@color/purple_500" />
<!-- CheckBox mejorado --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/purple_50" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:strokeColor="@color/purple_200">
<CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkDispFC" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_disp_fc" android:padding="12dp" android:textSize="16sp" android:buttonTint="@color/purple_500" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Fecha de entrega --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilFechaEntrega" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:hint="@string/label_fecha_entrega" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700" app:endIconMode="custom" app:endIconDrawable="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:endIconTint="@color/purple_500"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputFechaEntrega" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:focusable="false" android:clickable="true" android:inputType="none" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Tipo de promoción --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" android:id="@+id/tilTipoPromo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_tipo_promo" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700"> <AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/dropTipoPromo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="none" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Observaciones --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilObservaciones" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:hint="@string/label_observaciones" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/purple_500" app:hintTextColor="@color/purple_700" app:counterEnabled="true" app:counterMaxLength="200"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputObservaciones" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:minLines="3" android:maxLines="5" android:maxLength="200" android:gravity="top" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Botón Guardar --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnGuardar" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.UnelevatedButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="@string/action_guardar" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:icon="@drawable/ic_send" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:cornerRadius="28dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/purple_500" android:elevation="4dp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@android:color/transparent" tools:context=".ui.home.HomeFragment">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/top_wave_background" android:padding="24dp" android:paddingBottom="32dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/header_clients_today" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.02" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSubtitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="15sp" android:alpha="0.95" tools:text="5 clientes registrados hoy" /> </LinearLayout>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvClients" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingBottom="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/header" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" tools:listitem="@layout/item_client" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/emptyState" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<ImageView android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_list" android:alpha="0.3" app:tint="@color/purple_500" android:contentDescription="@string/no_clients_icon" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="@string/no_clients_today" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#666666" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/no_clients_description" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#999999" /> </LinearLayout>
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBar" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@android:color/transparent" tools:context=".ui.home.HomeFragment">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/top_wave_background" android:padding="24dp" android:paddingBottom="32dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/header_clients_today" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.02" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSubtitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="15sp" android:alpha="0.95" tools:text="5 clientes registrados hoy" /> </LinearLayout>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvClients" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingBottom="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/header" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" tools:listitem="@layout/item_client" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/emptyState" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<ImageView android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_list" android:alpha="0.3" app:tint="@color/purple_500" android:contentDescription="@string/no_clients_icon" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="@string/no_clients_today" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#666666" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/no_clients_description" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#999999" /> </LinearLayout>
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBar" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@android:color/transparent" tools:context=".ui.notifications.NotificationsFragment">
<TextView android:id="@+id/text_notifications" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:textAlignment="center" android:textSize="20sp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" /> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingBottom="16dp" tools:context=".ui.notifications.NotificationsFragment">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Header con gradiente --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/top_wave_background" android:padding="24dp" android:paddingBottom="32dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/header_statistics" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.02" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDateRange" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/stats_today" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="15sp" android:alpha="0.95" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Resumen general --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:weightSum="3">
<!-- Total Clientes --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTotalCount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="24" android:textSize="32sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" tools:text="24" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="@string/total_clients" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#666666" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Nuevos --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvNewCount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="8" android:textSize="32sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/accent_blue" tools:text="8" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="@string/new_today" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#666666" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Completados --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCompletedCount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="16" android:textSize="32sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/teal_700" tools:text="16" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="@string/completed" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#666666" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Card Dispenser Frío/Calor --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="6dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/dispenser_stats" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_menu_compass" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:drawableTint="@color/purple_700" />
<View android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:background="@color/purple_500" />
<!-- Barra de progreso visual para Sí --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/dispenser_yes" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" />
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressDispenserYes" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleHorizontal" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginHorizontal="12dp" android:max="100" android:progress="65" android:progressTint="@color/accent_blue" android:progressBackgroundTint="#E0E0E0" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDispenserYesCount" android:layout_width="50dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="15 (65%)" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/accent_blue" android:gravity="end" tools:text="15 (65%)" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Barra de progreso visual para No --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/dispenser_no" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" />
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressDispenserNo" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleHorizontal" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginHorizontal="12dp" android:max="100" android:progress="35" android:progressTint="#999999" android:progressBackgroundTint="#E0E0E0" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDispenserNoCount" android:layout_width="50dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="8 (35%)" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#666666" android:gravity="end" tools:text="8 (35%)" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Card Tipos de Promoción --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="6dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/promo_types_stats" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_sale" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:drawableTint="@color/purple_700" />
<View android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:background="@color/purple_500" />
<!-- Voucher --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/promo_voucher" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" />
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressVoucher" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleHorizontal" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginHorizontal="12dp" android:max="100" android:progress="55" android:progressTint="@color/purple_500" android:progressBackgroundTint="#E0E0E0" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvVoucherCount" android:layout_width="50dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="13 (55%)" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/purple_500" android:gravity="end" tools:text="13 (55%)" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Promo 50% --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/promo_50" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" />
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressPromo50" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleHorizontal" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginHorizontal="12dp" android:max="100" android:progress="45" android:progressTint="@color/accent_pink" android:progressBackgroundTint="#E0E0E0" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvPromo50Count" android:layout_width="50dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="11 (45%)" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/accent_pink" android:gravity="end" tools:text="11 (45%)" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Card Resumen por día de la semana --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="6dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/weekly_activity" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_menu_recent_history" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:drawableTint="@color/purple_700" />
<View android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:background="@color/purple_500" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/day_monday" android:textSize="14sp" />
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="12dp" android:layout_weight="0.8" android:layout_marginHorizontal="8dp" android:background="@color/purple_500" />
<TextView android:layout_width="30dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="8" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/day_tuesday" android:textSize="14sp" />
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="12dp" android:layout_weight="0.6" android:layout_marginHorizontal="8dp" android:background="@color/accent_blue" />
<TextView android:layout_width="30dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="6" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/day_wednesday" android:textSize="14sp" />
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="12dp" android:layout_weight="0.5" android:layout_marginHorizontal="8dp" android:background="@color/accent_pink" />
<TextView android:layout_width="30dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="5" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/day_thursday" android:textSize="14sp" />
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="12dp" android:layout_weight="0.7" android:layout_marginHorizontal="8dp" android:background="@color/teal_700" />
<TextView android:layout_width="30dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="7" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/day_friday" android:textSize="14sp" />
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="12dp" android:layout_weight="0.9" android:layout_marginHorizontal="8dp" android:background="@color/purple_700" />
<TextView android:layout_width="30dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="9" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="end" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginVertical="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Icono de usuario con fondo circular --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/iconContainer" android:layout_width="56dp" android:layout_height="56dp" app:cardCornerRadius="28dp" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/purple_50" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/ivClientIcon" android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_person" app:tint="@color/purple_500" android:contentDescription="@string/client_icon" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Nombre del cliente --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvClientName" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/black" android:maxLines="1" android:ellipsize="end" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/chipStatus" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/iconContainer" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/iconContainer" tools:text="Juan Pérez" />
<!-- Dirección --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvClientAddress" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:maxLines="1" android:ellipsize="end" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_menu_mylocation" android:drawablePadding="4dp" android:drawableTint="#999999" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/tvClientName" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/tvClientName" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/tvClientName" tools:text="Av. Libertador 1234" />
<!-- Chip de estado --> <com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/chipStatus" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Chip.Action" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="@string/status_new" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/white" app:chipBackgroundColor="@color/purple_500" app:chipCornerRadius="16dp" app:chipIconVisible="false" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" tools:text="Nuevo" />
<!-- Divider --> <View android:id="@+id/divider" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="#E0E0E0" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/iconContainer" />
<!-- Info adicional --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/divider">
<!-- Reparto --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_reparto_short" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#999999" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvReparto" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/purple_700" tools:text="123" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Localidad --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_localidad" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#999999" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvLocalidad" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/black" android:maxLines="1" android:ellipsize="end" tools:text="CABA" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Hora --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="end">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_time" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#999999" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTime" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/accent_blue" tools:text="14:30" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color> <color name="purple_500">#FF6200EE</color> <color name="purple_700">#FF3700B3</color> <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color>
<!-- Colores adicionales para el diseño mejorado --> <color name="purple_50">#F3E5F5</color> <color name="background_light">#F5F5F5</color> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color> <color name="purple_500">#6B5DD3</color> <color name="purple_700">#5848B8</color> <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color>
<!-- Colores adicionales para el diseño mejorado --> <color name="purple_50">#F3E5F5</color> <color name="background_light">#F8F9FA</color>
<!-- Gradientes modernos --> <color name="gradient_start">#667eea</color> <color name="gradient_center">#764ba2</color> <color name="gradient_end">#f093fb</color>
<!-- Colores de acento --> <color name="accent_pink">#E91E63</color> <color name="accent_blue">#2196F3</color>
<!-- Cards y superficies --> <color name="card_background">#FFFFFF</color> <color name="card_background_blur">#CCFFFFFF</color> <color name="overlay_dark">#40000000</color> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <string name="app_name">AltaPromos</string> <string name="title_home">Inicio</string> <string name="title_dashboard">Alta</string> <string name="title_notifications">Estadisticas</string>
<!-- Altas form labels --> <string name="label_reparto">Número de Reparto</string> <string name="label_reparto_short">Reparto</string> <string name="hint_reparto">Ingrese el nro. de reparto</string> <string name="label_nombre">Nombre Completo</string> <string name="hint_nombre">Ej: Juan Pérez</string> <string name="label_direccion">Dirección</string> <string name="hint_direccion">Busque y seleccione la dirección</string> <string name="label_localidad">Localidad</string> <string name="hint_localidad">Seleccione una localidad</string> <string name="label_telefono">Teléfono</string> <string name="hint_telefono">Ej: 11 5555-5555</string> <string name="label_email">Email</string> <string name="hint_email">nombre@dominio.com</string> <string name="label_dia_visita">Día de visita</string> <string name="label_fecha_entrega">Fecha de entrega</string> <string name="hint_fecha_entrega">Seleccione una fecha</string> <string name="label_tipo_promo">Tipo de promoción</string> <string name="label_observaciones">Observaciones</string> <string name="hint_observaciones">Notas adicionales…</string> <string name="label_disp_fc">Quiere dispenser frío/calor</string> <string name="label_time">Hora</string>
<!-- Headers / sections --> <string name="header_nuevo_cliente">Nuevo Cliente</string> <string name="header_subtitle">Complete los datos del cliente</string> <string name="section_datos_basicos">Datos Básicos</string> <string name="section_contacto">Contacto</string> <string name="section_promo">Datos de la promoción</string>
<!-- Home list --> <string name="header_clients_today">Clientes del Día</string> <string name="clients_today_count">%d clientes registrados hoy</string> <string name="no_clients_today">Sin clientes aún</string> <string name="no_clients_description">Los clientes que registres hoy aparecerán aquí</string> <string name="client_icon">Icono de cliente</string> <string name="no_clients_icon">Sin clientes</string>
<!-- Status --> <string name="status_new">Nuevo</string> <string name="status_pending">Pendiente</string> <string name="status_completed">Completado</string>
<!-- Statistics screen --> <string name="header_statistics">Estadísticas</string> <string name="stats_today">Resumen de hoy</string> <string name="total_clients">Total</string> <string name="new_today">Nuevos</string> <string name="completed">Completados</string> <string name="dispenser_stats">Dispenser Frío/Calor</string> <string name="dispenser_yes">Sí quiere</string> <string name="dispenser_no">No quiere</string> <string name="promo_types_stats">Tipos de Promoción</string> <string name="promo_voucher">Voucher</string> <string name="promo_50">Promo 50%</string> <string name="weekly_activity">Actividad Semanal</string> <string name="day_monday">Lunes</string> <string name="day_tuesday">Martes</string> <string name="day_wednesday">Miércoles</string> <string name="day_thursday">Jueves</string> <string name="day_friday">Viernes</string>
<!-- Actions / errors --> <string name="action_guardar">Enviar</string> <string name="error_requerido">Requerido</string>
<!-- Arrays --> <string-array name="dias_semana"> <item>Lunes</item> <item>Martes</item> <item>Miércoles</item> <item>Jueves</item> <item>Viernes</item> <item>Sábado</item> </string-array> <string-array name="tipos_promocion"> <item>Voucher</item> <item>Promo 50%</item> </string-array>
<!-- API key placeholder --> <string name="google_maps_key" translatable="false">YOUR_API_KEY_HERE</string> </resources>
